t:
As my 19 year old, beautiful girlfriend entered the restaurant, she drew whistles from the other customers.


And when she sat across me, a middle aged man, they started whispering among themselves.



I hate such people. We're only trying to celebrate our 10th anniversary in peace.
c:
After the dinner we need to pick up our 5 year old daughter from her uncle's place.



#love #aniversary #girlfriend #agegap #childabuse #childhoodlove #crime #childmarriage
